basics.name: Eric Lu
basics.label: Lead Engineer
basics.summary: Eric Lu has 7 years experiences in Android development, currently working at Yahoo in Taiwan as a lead engineer.

work.summary: I worked at Yahoo in Taiwan as a lead engineer.
highlights: Develop E-commerce applications for millions of users
Share and instruct internal tech talks about Android development regularly
Develop internal SDK used by many Yahoo-branded apps
Lead interns in their innovative Android project
Won the first prize in the Yahoo Japan Hackathon
Play the role of SCRUM master

volunteer.organization: Dog Home Organization (流浪動物花園)
volunteer.summary: Take care stray animals, help them find a new home.

awards.title: 2016 Yahoo Taiwan x Japan Hack day - 1st Prize

publications.name: Android Developer Tools 深入精要 (Android Developer Tools Essentials: Android Studio to Zipalign)
publications.summary: I was the translator of this book, translated it from English to Chinese. I got more clear understandings about using Android developer tools in my daily Android app developments.

publications.name: Google Glass 開發指南 (Google Glass Development Guide)
publications.summary: I was the translator of this book, translated it from Simplified Chinese to Traditional Chinese. I learnt some concepts of using Google Glass development kit and Mirror API in that time.
